EmailTemplate.description: Second Notification for orders push to portal
EmailTemplate.name: ATR Orders Second Notification for Send to Portal
EmailTemplate.subject: Now Open! Honeywell's Express-Lane: the MyAerospace Web Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your Honeywell Aerospace order request.
Effective March 31, 2015, we will no longer accept orders made via email. All ordering can be done on our web portal, www.MyAerospace.com. Visit the portal today!
To watch one of our on-demand New User training tutorials, please visit www.MyAerospace.Honeywell.com.
You may also attend one of two live training sessions offered at the following dates and times.
Monday, Mar. 30th @ 7am (MST) Click for Lync Meeting Details
Tuesday, Mar 31st @ 1pm (MST) Click for Lync Meeting Details
For any correspondance regarding this request, please respond directly to this email. Your Case number and reference ID are {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}.
As always, we appreciate your business, and let us know of any questions.
Thank you!
Honeywell Aerospace
